example.name: LED Bar Graph
example.description:
Turns on a series of LEDs based on the value of an analog sensor. This is a simple way to make a bar graph display. Though this graph uses 10 LEDs, you can use any number by changing the LED count and the pins in the array.

This method can be used to control any series of digital outputs that depends on an analog input.

The circuit: LEDs from pins 2 through 11 to ground
example.author: Tom Igoe
